Plintissa was still slowly moving back to base, but she was majorly upset. =
Her life was a shambles, and there wasn't anything that she could do about =
it, she couldn't kill herself or Deemos. Clash suddenly landed in front of =
Plintissa. A smile crossed his face. (He is as big as Rampage.) Plintissa s=
tepped backwards.

Clash: Hello, there.

Plintissa: Who are you?

Clash: I =
am Clash, a basic bot from basic Cybertron, you are going to vhange that, t=
hough.

Plintissa: How am I going to change that? Why do you want me?

Clas=
h: You, my dear, will be my first...victim.

Plintissa: Your...going to kil=
l me?

Clash: Let's not use that word.

Plintissa: You would kill me?

Clas=
h: Well, more like I'm going to use you really.

Plintissa: I am Deemos' sl=
ave, go away.

Clash: Not for much longer, you shall be mine, for my dear, =
your death will be my fuel.

Plintissa: Deemos would make a much better sla=
ve than I, he...

Clash: NO! You are weak, you are perfect, I want YOU! Bes=
ides, it's not really like that, I thought you wanted to die?

Plintissa: T=
hat is what I thought, now, wasn't it?

Clash: Whather you want to die or n=
ot, your death is immenent.

Plintissa: I beat a many bots down before, why=
 do you want to risk your life against me?

Clash: You will be no match for=
 me, you are weakened and alone, what are you going to do? Squirt ink on me=
?

Plintissa pretended to turn away, and when Clash floated up, she spun ar=
ound and slashed across Clash's throat with a knife. Clash bled, but the wo=
und started to heal.

Clash: That was a knife wound? Shame, shame.

Plintis=
sa lunged, trying to knock Clash down, Clash moved his hand and knocked Pli=
ntissa to the ground. Clash's fingers opened and revealed a number of blast=
ers and torture devices. Plintissa tried to crawl away but he reached down =
and grabbed her. (Plintissa is only Deluxe sized, Clash is Ultra) Plintissa=
 started to pry Clash's hands apart with her many tentacles extending from =
her back, but Clash held on tight, his strength beating out Plintissa's... =
(My post ends here, I want to give others a chnace to respond.)
